alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 6:50PM EDT until August 15 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 649 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Meadville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Meadville, Guys Mills, Saegertown, Hydetown, Blooming Valley, Townville and Woodcock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
